name: Power
description: Raise a number to a power. See [Math.pow on MDN](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Math/pow) for more information.

arguments.name: Base
arguments.description: The number to be raised to the exponent.

arguments.name: Exponent
arguments.description: The exponent to raise the base to.

output.description: The result of raising the base to the exponent.
